title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other LLMs locally with a single CLI or REST API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API—works in Node, Bun, Deno and browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client and asyncio bindings for Ollama; pip install ollama.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLMs or embedders.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI for Ollama—Markdown, code highlighting, multi-chat, admin panel.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builder API and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI for Ollama with readline history and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Visual Studio Code extension that turns Ollama models into inline code copilots.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that exposes Ollama chat and image-generation endpoints via slash commands.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU and PVC support.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that lets CI pipelines pull, run and test Ollama models reproducibly.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: n8n community node to integrate Ollama chat and embeddings into no-code workflows.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaTextEmbedder components.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community C# / .NET client for Ollama with async enumerable streaming support.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library generated from OpenAPI spec; go get github.com/ollama/ollama/go.

title: ollama-models
summary: Curated registry of Modelfile recipes for community-tuned Llama, Mistral, CodeLlama variants.

title: ollama-logseq
summary: Logseq plugin that adds Ollama-powered summarization and Q&A slash commands to your notes.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Lightweight Slack bot server (Node) that answers channel mentions using any Ollama model.

title: ollama-huggingface-hub
summary: Hugging Face hub utility to convert and push quantized models into Ollama Modelfile format.
